name: superstring
description: A data structure to efficiently represent the results of applying patches.

scripts.build:browser: em++ --bind -o browser.js -O3 -std=c++14 -I src/bindings/em -I src/core -include iostream src/core/*.cc src/bindings/em/*.cc -s TOTAL_MEMORY=134217728 --memory-init-file 0
scripts.build:browser:maybe: test -f browser.js || test -n "$CI" || ! command -v em++ 2>&1 > /dev/null || npm run build:browser
scripts.build:all: npm run build:node && npm run build:browser
scripts.install: npm run build:node && npm run build:browser:maybe
scripts.ci: npm run standard && node-gyp rebuild --debug --tests && npm run test

author: Nathan Sobo <nathan@github.com>
